Sentencas: The oxygen nonstoichiometry, delta, of La1-xCaxCrO3-delta (x=0.1-0.3) was measured by means of thermogravimetry as a function of oxygen partial pressure, P(O-2), temperature, T, between 1073 and 1373 K, and the content of calcium, x.
Titulo: Oxygen nonstoichiometry of the perovskite-type oxide la1-xCaxCrO3-δ (x=0.1, 0.2, 0.3)

Sentencas: In any compositions, delta becomes larger and is getting closer to delta=x/2 with decreasing P(O-2).
Titulo: Oxygen nonstoichiometry of the perovskite-type oxide la1-xCaxCrO3-δ (x=0.1, 0.2, 0.3)

Sentencas: At the same P(O-2), delta of La1-xCaxCrO3-delta increases with increasing T and x. There is almost no difference in oxygen nonstoichiometry between Ca-doped lanthanum chromite and Sr-doped lanthanum chromite.
Titulo: Oxygen nonstoichiometry of the perovskite-type oxide la1-xCaxCrO3-δ (x=0.1, 0.2, 0.3)

Sentencas: Defect chemical analysis was performed taking defect interaction into consideration.
Titulo: Oxygen nonstoichiometry of the perovskite-type oxide la1-xCaxCrO3-δ (x=0.1, 0.2, 0.3)

Sentencas: The nonstoichiometry curves were reproduced well by the proposed defect model and the obtained thermodynamic parameters.
Titulo: Oxygen nonstoichiometry of the perovskite-type oxide la1-xCaxCrO3-δ (x=0.1, 0.2, 0.3)

Sentencas: The influence of defect interaction on defect formation energy can be mainly attributed to change in interatomic potential due to defect-induced lattice expansion.
Titulo: Oxygen nonstoichiometry of the perovskite-type oxide la1-xCaxCrO3-δ (x=0.1, 0.2, 0.3)
